title: Russia-Ukraine war live: Blinken says US did not ‘enable’ Ukraine strikes inside Russia
description:
US secretary of state says it ‘neither encouraged nor enabled’ drone strikes deep inside Russia that damaged long-range bombers

  • What we know on day 287 of the invasion

More now on Europe’s energy crisis
link:
via AFP:

Sky-high energy prices have caused numerous factories
column5: which was highly dependent upon cheap Russian gas
column6:
to halt operations. But European nations were able to fill their gas reservoirs and no one has been cut off yet.

title: Ukraine calls on western allies to boycott Russian culture
description:
Minister defends step in ‘civilisational battle’ but says it would not amount to ‘cancelling Tchaikovsky’

  • Russia-Ukraine war – latest news updates

Ukraine’s culture minister has called on the country’s western allies to boycott Russian culture
link:
urging a halt to performances of the music of Tchaikovsky and other Russian composers until the end of the war.

Writing in the Guardian
column4: Oleksandr Tkachenko argues that such a “cultural boycott” would not amount to “cancelling Tchaikovsky”
column5:
but would be “pausing the performance of his works until Russia ceases its bloody invasion”.
